name: lily pad coaster

elevate your home d√©cor with the "lily pad coaster" crochet pattern, featuring a lovely ribbed texture and a delicate floral edging! perfect for both beginners and seasoned crafters, this easy-to-follow pattern adds a touch of whimsy to your coffee table while protecting surfaces from spills. with vibrant or muted colors, these coasters radiate positivity and make wonderful gifts or a lovely addition to your own collection. grab your yarn and hook, and create some cozy, handmade beauty!

this pattern is made in dk weight yarn with a 4.5mm hook. i think a synthetic or plant fiber is best for a coaster, as you will want it to be easy care. this coaster is worked in the round in dc st. you work increases every rnd with an easy ribbed repeat. you will add a floral edging on the last rnd. gauge is not crucial in such a small piece.

this pattern is written for one size which should be a perfect fit for most mugs. if you find that it is too small/too large for your mug, i encourage you to experiment with another gauge or the number of increase rnds.

this is a beginner friendly pattern, it uses basic stitches and includes a photo tutorial at the end of the written instructions. there are also links to video tutorials for all the special techniques.
